item.title: Diff All Files - Reviewing Changesets Quickly
item.description: Diff all files info “Updated: 2017-07-14” Still find this incredibly awesome! Developer just updated for Visual Studio 2017 after a lot of hard work. Github repo here for any issues. Big thanks to DeadlyDog for this great tool and putting in the effort to update for VS2017. deadlydog/VS.DiffAllFiles: Visual Studio Extension to make comparing files before and after committing them to Git and TFS faster and easier info “Updated: 2016-01-25” I started using the option to compare a single file at a time, since it picks up the syntax highlighting then.
